WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  39
   Observation Tool
INSTRUCTIONS 
This observation tool is used to monitor essential birth practices during childbirth.  Review each question  
and sub-question and mark if the practice was completed (Y for Yes) or not completed (N for No).
